_source.text: Add your review A most enjoyable stay.Everything worked out far better than a negative review I had read prior to travelling.The staff were most helpful,food very good with fresh vegetables and varied menu's Handy for getting to town and railway station only 5 minutes walk away should you wish to venture further afield.Will certainly recommend this hotel.
